text.section:
This section does not apply to:
a candidate for the office of judge of the circuit court;
a candidate selected by a political party to fill a vacancy in nomination under Subtitle 9 or Subtitle 10 of this title; or
a candidate defeated in a presidential preference primary.
The name of a candidate who is defeated for the nomination for a public office may not appear on the ballot at the next succeeding general election as a candidate for any office.
